snippet: A pogrom against a population of Muslims called the Rohingyas shows the ugly side of Myanmar’s democratic transition.
abstract: Op-Ed article by economist Moshahida Sultana Ritu calls attention to the pogrom against a population of Muslims in Myanmar called the Rohingyas; urges the international community not to turn a blind eye to state-sponsored ethnic cleansing in its eagerness to celebrate the country's transition to democracy.
lead_paragraph: A pogrom against a population of Muslims called the Rohingyas shows the ugly side of Myanmar’s democratic transition.
